title: #79 POP Dive: Hocus Pocus
itunes:title: #79 POP Dive: Hocus Pocus
itunes:subtitle: In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny welcomes Amanda Hasaka over to talk about 1993's Halloween classic Hocus Pocus. They discuss favorite moments, the similarly iconic family-friendly Casper, and lots more! *To support this podcast and fo...
description:
In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny welcomes Amanda Hasaka over to talk about 1993's Halloween classic Hocus Pocus. They discuss favorite moments, the similarly iconic family-friendly Casper, and lots more!


*To support this podcast and for bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
